segments.text: I'm getting so paunchy that I'm afraid I have to buy a new belt to-morrow , and I think I must go on a diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are just a little bit chubby , not paunchy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , I'm a compulsive overeater . I got to watch what I eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More physical exercise may help to keep your weight down .
segments.speaker: S2
